      • Signer

        public Signer(java.lang.String keystorePath,
              java.lang.String keystorePass,
              boolean certificateExpirationCheck,
              java.lang.String signatureMethod)
       throws TechnicalException
        Build a signer
        Parameters:
        keystorePath - Keystore Path
        keystorePass - Keystore password
        certificateExpirationCheck - True if the certificate expiration check should be done
        signatureMethod - Signature method to use
        Throws:
        TechnicalException - Thrown when something went wrong when building the Signer
